title: Betsy's Wedding
overview: Offbeat fashion student Betsy Hopper and her straight-laced investment-banker fianc√© Jake Lovell just want an intimate little wedding reception, but Betsy's father Eddie, a Long Island construction contractor, feels so threatened by Jake's rich WASP parents that he blows the ceremony up into a bank-breaking showpiece, sending his wife Lola into a financial panic.
